Sentence: In addition to the peasant girls, Esteban also has sexual relations with prostitutes, including Transito Soto
Transito and Esteban become friends, and he (Esteban) lends her (Clara) money to move to the city
Desperate to find Alba, Esteban turns to Transito Soto, who runs the Christopher Columbus, a brothel-turned-hotel

Thanks to the connections she (Alba) has established through her (Alba) sex work, Transito is able to repay the favor Esteban did for her (Alba) years before, and she (Alba) assures that Alba is returned home
